Package pong.application.windows

Class StringDrawingContext

java.lang.Object
pong.application.windows.StringDrawingContext
Direct Known Subclasses:
CenteredStringDrawingContext
public abstract class StringDrawingContext extends Object
Defines the core behavior of a string drawing context and provides a base for derived classes.
Author:
Ishan Pranav

    • setFontName

      public final void setFontName​(String value)
      Sets the font name.
      Parameters:

    • setSize

      public final void setSize​(int value)
      Sets the font size.
      Parameters:
